Rulings.Edison:
The ①:
● Tributing a Plant monster is a cost, which must be paid in order to activate this card from your hand.
●This card can only ever summon 1 monster, similar to "Call of the Haunted".
The ②: 
● This card continuously targets the card it summoned, similar to "Call of the Haunted"

Rulings.Base: 1. Calculate the maximum Level of monster you can Special Summon based on the Level of the Tributed monster when it was on the field.\n2. "Super Solar Nutrient" does not target a monster in your hand or Deck. However, it does target the Special Summoned monster after it is Special Summoned.\n3. Tributing a Plant for this card's activation is a cost.

PSCT.Edison:
① Activate this card (from your hand) by Tributing 1 Level 2 or lower Plant monster; Special Summon 1 Plant monster from your hand/Deck, whose Level is less than or equal to the Level the Tributed monster had on the field +3. 
② When this card leaves the field, destroy that monster.
③ When that monster leaves the field, destroy this card.

PSCT.Base: Activate this card by Tributing 1 Level 2 or lower Plant-Type monster; Special Summon 1 Plant-Type monster from your hand or Deck whose Level is less than or equal to the Level the Tributed monster had on the field +3.
